## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Is it related to a frustration or limitation?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when [...]"

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered any alternative solutions or features?

## Use Case

Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful.

## Implementation Ideas

If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, share them here.

## Mockups/Examples

If applicable, add mockups, screenshots, or examples of similar features in other applications.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, links, or references about the feature request.

## Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to avoid duplicates
